title: What started polygamy? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: a) Men who were better and stronger than other men and women deciding that having a strong protector with good genes was more important than not having to share (or the biological imperative to that effect). b) WAR. When you lose 75% of the able bodied men to war, women have to share because they don’t want to be alone. c) Slavery. When you WIN the war, your side has just taken over the rival village and there are spoils to be had, including the women who no longer have anyone to protect them.
What started polygamy? The first time a wife told her husband, "Not tonight, I'm not in the mood!"
